title: Systemutvecklare
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **5+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 **Rollbeskrivning**:

**Vi söker nu efter en Systemutvecklare till vår kund inom offentlig sektor.**

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter**

  

* Självständigt utveckla REST API funktionalitet i Python och FastAPI
* Skriva lättförstådd kod med hög kvalitet
* Skriva enhets- samt integrationstester
* Integrera applikation och tester i systemets bygg pipeline och DevOps rutiner
* Konfiguration av Linux server
* Medverka i teamets planeringsaktiviteter
* Delta i förvaltningen av de IT-system som projektet levererar, där användarstöd, felsökning, buggrättning och vidareutveckling ingår samt bistå i övrigt i IT-förvaltningen, kan bli aktuellt längre fram
* Ta fram lösningsförslag enligt verksamhetens behov
* I rollen som **systemutvecklare** förväntas du även att bidra med kunskap kring:  

	+ Ramverk för Python
	+ Testning och kodscanning, SonarQube och JFrog Xray
	+ Mjukvaruarkitektur i Python-applikationer
	+ System- och arkitekturdokumentation

  



**Obligatoriska krav**

**Utbildning**  

**Högskole/universitetsutbildning 120hp/180hp inom IT eller minst 6 års arbetslivserfarenhet som systemutvecklare**

**Kompetens och erfarenhet:**

* **Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling, varav minst tre (3) år i Pythonapplikationer med relationsdatabas-implementationer**
* **Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av agila arbetssätt**
* **Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av CI/CD och DevOps, där verktyg som Git, Azure DevOps Server, GitLab och/eller GitHub har använts**
* **Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete i containeriserad miljö där plattformar som Docker, Docker-compose, Podman och/eller Kubernetes har nyttjats**

**Mervärdeskrav**

* Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling i Python av applikationer som stödjer dataanalys.
* Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet från testdriven utveckling.
* Minst två (2) år arbetslivserfarenhet från design av säkra mjukvarulösningar.

 **Placeringsort:** Sundbyberg

**Omfattning:** Heltid på plats i kundens lokaler, med viss möjlighet till distansarbete.

**Start:** 2025-04-21

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi söker en systemutvecklare för tillståndsövervakningsprojekt hos myndighet i Stockholm.,


Detta är ett konsultuppdrag.


Tjänsten är på heltid, och säkerhetsprövning krävs  

Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**


Myndigheten är den som ansvarar för att elöverföringssystemet är säkert, miljöanpassat och kostnadseffektivt - idag och i framtiden. Den drivs i form av ett statligt affärsverk, och har drygt 1500 anställda varav majoriteten arbetar på huvudkontoret i Stockholm  

  

Mycket händer inom elmarknads- och kraftsystemområdena, bl.a. genom energiomställning och utökat nordiskt och europeiskt samarbete. Ett flertal spännande projekt pågår hos myndighheten där de utvecklar bl.a. olika stödsystem för att möta nya behov och söker nu en systemutvecklare till ett utvecklingsteam. Som Systemutvecklare med fokus på Python ingår man i ett utvecklingsteam som är en del av ett projekt. Teamets uppdrag i projektet är att utveckla en applikation för insamling och analys av information från olika driftmiljöer. Utvecklingsteamet består idag av flera personer med olika roller, bland annat UX-designer, utvecklare, arkitekt och testare.


**Arbetsuppgifter**

  

* Ta fram lösningsförslag enligt verksamhetens behov
* Självständigt utveckla REST API funktionalitet i Python och FastAPI
* Skriva lättförstådd kod med hög kvalitet
* Skriva enhets- samt integrationstester
* Integrera applikation och tester i systemets bygg pipeline och DevOps rutiner
* Konfiguration av Linux server
* Medverka i teamets planeringsaktiviteter
* Delta i förvaltningen av de IT-system som projektet levererar, där användarstöd, felsökning, buggrättning och vidareutveckling ingår samt bistå i övrigt i IT-förvaltningen, kan bli aktuellt längre fram


I rollen som systemutvecklare förväntas du även att bidra med kunskap kring:

* Ramverk för Python
* Testning och kodscanning, SonarQube och JFrog Xray
* Mjukvaruarkitektur i Python-applikationer
* System- och arkitekturdokumentation

**Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**


Högskole/universitetsutbildning 120hp/180hp inom IT eller minst 6 års arbetslivserfarenhet som systemutvecklare  

Minst fem (5) års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling, varav minst tre (3) år i Pythonapplikationer med relationsdatabas-implementationer  

Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av agila arbetssätt  

Minst tre (3) års arbetslivserfarenhet av CI/CD och DevOps, där verktyg som Git, Azure DevOps Server, GitLab och/eller GitHub har använts
  

Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete i containeriserad miljö där plattformar som Docker, Docker-compose, Podman och/eller Kubernetes har nyttjats

**Meriterande**

Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling i Python av applikationer som stödjer dataanalys.  

Minst två (2) års arbetslivserfarenhet från testdriven utveckling.  

Minst två (2) år arbetslivserfarenhet från design av säkra mjukvarulösningar





**Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Underkonsultuppdrag – Senior DevOps utvecklare
description:
Vi söker en erfaren **DevOps/.NET Engineer** som vill ta sig an ett spännande uppdrag hos en av våra kunder i hjärtat av Stockholm. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla och underhålla kundens CI/CD pipelines och molninfrastruktur – med fokus på modern teknikstack och hög tillgänglighet. Start Maj.

### **Vi söker dig som har:**

* God erfarenhet av **CI/CD-verktyg** såsom **TeamCity, Octopus, GitHub Actions, Git**
* Erfarenhet av **Amazon Web Services (AWS)**
* Tidigare arbete med **Logging och Observability-verktyg** som **DataDog, CloudWatch och Loggly**
* Kompetens inom **.NET-applikationer som körs på AWS**
* Erfarenhet av **SQL Server** kunskap inom **Containers och Cloudformation**
* Erfarenhet av andra molnplattformar (t.ex. Azure, GCP)
* Infrastruktur som kod med verktyg som Terraform
* Scripting (t.ex. PowerShell, Bash)
* Erfarenhet av agilt arbetssätt och DevOps-kultur
* Säkerhetsfokus i CI/CD och molnimplementationer


Uppdraget är på 6 månader med chans till förlängning.


Du är en självgående konsult med en pragmatisk inställning, en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya miljöer och en stark vilja att bidra till både stabil drift och innovativ utveckling. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på engelska och svenska.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare C/C++
description:
Brinner du för kod, innovation och smarta lösningar och är en nyfiken och engagerad person med erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling? Då kan detta vara jobbet för dig!

 *Kund är ett teknikkonsultföretag som erbjuder tjänster inom mjukvaruutveckling och hårdvarudesign till några av Sveriges ledande företag inom fordons- och techindustrin. Företagets framgång bygger på att möjliggöra medarbetares fulla potential - deras viktigaste tillgång.*

  

Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

 **Om tjänsten**  

I rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare hos kund kommer du tillhöra ett team mellan 3-8 personer och vara bidragande genom hela utvecklingsprocessen, från design och implementering till testning. Arbetet är främst inriktat på fordonsindustrin, med fokus på inbyggda systemarkitekturer och utveckling av nya funktioner.

* Du kommer mestadels programmera i C och/eller C++ för inbyggda applikationer.
* I rollen kan det förekomma verifiering av mjukvara för att säkerställa dess kvalitet och prestanda.
* Arbeta med moderna och högpresterande teknikstackar för utveckling av robusta och skalbara mjukvarulösningar.

 **Du erbjuds**

* **Trygg och inkluderande arbetsplats**: En arbetsplats som värdesätter mångfald, respekt och ett starkt teamarbet
* **Utvecklingsmöjligheter**: En chans att växa professionellt genom spännande projekt, kompetensutveckling och tillgång till de senaste testverktygen och teknikerna.
* **Påverkan och delaktighet**: En nyckelroll där dina idéer och initiativ gör skillnad i produktutvecklingen och kvalitetssäkringen.

  

**Vi söker dig som**

* Har erfarenhet av rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare, mjukvaruingenjör eller liknande.
* Besitter gedigna kunskaper i C och C++.
* Innehar en relevant högskoleutbildning / YH-utbildning inom exempelvis Embedded, Elektronik, Datakommunikation, Mekatronik.
* Har ett genuint intresse för programmering och en stark drivkraft att kontinuerligt utvecklas och förbättra sina tekniska färdigheter.
* B-körkort

 **Meriterande**

* Erfarenhet av systemtestning och mjukvaruverifiering med verktyg såsom CANalyzer eller CANoe
* God förståelse och praktisk erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling (TDD).
* Kunskap inom och tillämpning av designmönster (Design Patterns) inom mjukvaruutveckling**.**
* Förmåga att arbeta med moderna och högpresterande teknikstackar.

 **Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Sofie Andersson:  

sofie@futuriapeople.se

  

Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!

  

Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

 ***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: CoPilot-Studio utvecklare - Sveriges Radio
description:
**CoPilot-Studio utvecklare - Sveriges Radio**
==============================================


Sista ansökningsdag:


2025-04-08

 **Placeringsort:**


Hybrid minst 2 dagar på plats (Stockholm)

**Avtalsperiod:**


2025-04 till 2025-11-30 med möjlighet till förlängning

**Omfattning:**


100%

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning:**


Bakgrund
Sveriges Radio gör stora satsningar inom AI och avdelningen IT-Arbetsplats har fått i uppdrag att driva AI-utveckling med målet att höja den interna produktiviteten. Vi söker nu 2 konsulter som kan hjälpa oss att starta upp arbetet.
AI-utveckling på avdelningen IT-Arbetsplats kommer att ske mot CoPilot Studio-plattformen i Azure.
**Uppdragets innehåll**  

* Analys och behovsbedömning:
o Genomföra en analys av nuvarande arbetsprocesser och identifiera områden där AI kan bidra till ökad produktivitet (ett tidigare arbete har genomförts vilket ligger till grund för vidare undersökningar).
o Samla in och dokumentera krav och önskemål från olika intressenter inom organisationen.
* Strategi och planering:
o Utveckla en strategi och handlingsplan för AI-implementering, inklusive tidsramar och milstolpar.
o Definiera mål och KPI:er för AI-projektet.
* Teknisk implementering:
o Utveckla och implementera initiala AI-lösningar baserade på identifierade behov.
o Säkerställa att AI-applikationer har sömlös tillgång till kvalitativa datakällor samt arbeta med tillgängliggörandet av data och information, strukturerad och ostrukturerad
o Dokumentera RAG-flöden
* Utbildning och support:
o Utbilda personalen i användningen av AI-verktyg och plattformen.
o Ge löpande support och rådgivning för att säkerställa en smidig övergång och användning.
* Utvärdering och rapportering:
o Utvärdera projektets framsteg och resultat.
o Rapportera regelbundet till projektledningen och föreslå förbättringar och justeringar.
o Eventuellt lära upp en trainee/junior CoPilot Studio-utvecklare
**Obligatoriska krav:**

* + Erfarenhet av AI-utveckling och implementeringprocesser
* + Kunskap om CoPilot Studio-plattformen och Azure
* + Förståelse för GenAI, RAG och LLM
* + Erfarenhet av C#/, Python eller andra relevanta programmeringsspråk
* + Stark analytisk förmåga och erfarenhet av behovsbedömning.
* + God kommunikationsförmåga och erfarenhet av att utbilda och stödja personal.
* + Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och driva projekt framåt.

**Mervärdeskrav:**

  

* + Förslag på upplägg/genomförande av uppdraget <- **ska svaras på i ditt anbud**
* + Säkerhetsklassning kan bli aktuellt – tilldelning av uppdraget kräver att konsulten blir godkänd
  

**OBS. Bifoga egen kravmatris som svar på kompetenser samt förslag på genomförande för kunden. Konsulten kommer EJ att ta lead på arbetet utan det görs i kombination med en konsult från Magello.**

title: Senior Node.js Developer
description:
At Anyfin HQ, nestled in the vibrant heart of Stockholm, we’re on a mission to transform the financial world. By equipping people with smart, innovative tools, we’re changing how individuals manage their financial well-being on an international scale. Our vision is clear and powerful: to improve the financial health of every individual, one debt at a time.

**About Us:** Since our inception in 2017, we’ve helped thousands of Swedes, Finns, Germans, and Norwegians take back control of their finances, saving millions by refinancing costly consumer credit. But this is just the beginning. With new markets to conquer, cutting-edge tools, and ambitious products on the horizon, we are constantly seeking new ways to elevate people’s financial situations. And to reach these bold goals, we need passionate and talented individuals like you.

 **What You Will Be Doing:**
  

As a **Senior Node.js Developer** at Anyfin, you’ll dive deep into building and optimizing complex financial backend systems. You’ll be part of a fast-paced startup environment, collaborating with driven colleagues who thrive on innovation. Our team values growth, diversity, and adaptability, and you’ll have the chance to contribute to impactful projects from your very first day.

**Your Responsibilities:**

* Specialize in backend development, utilizing **Node.js** and **SQL** to build robust and scalable financial systems.
* Tackle complex coding challenges, crafting new backend solutions, and refining existing ones.
* Work with **TypeScript**, **GraphQL**, **Postgres**, and occasionally touch on **React**, but the backend will be your primary focus.
* Contribute to the design and architecture of financial platforms, ensuring the scalability and reliability of our systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to shape both product and business strategies.
* Share your backend expertise with the team, championing best practices and continuous learning.

**Who You Are:**

* **Proficient in Node.js** and backend in general. Experience with **SQL databases** (preferably Postgres) is essential.
* You have a passion for solving intricate backend problems, especially in high-stakes environments like finance.
* At least 5 years of professional experience in software development. Experience with financial systems is a huge plus.
* A good understanding of system design, clean code, and pragmatic problem-solving.
* Bonus points if you’re familiar with **React**, **Python**, **Go**, **GraphQL**,Kubernetes, Google Cloud/AWS or **DevOps with Github Actions** but your backend experience will take center stage here.

**Why Join Us?** We promise you’ll be challenged and pushed to develop your skill set, all while working alongside a talented and ambitious team. Though we’ve made significant strides, the most exciting part of our journey is just beginning. Plus, we offer competitive compensation, a cozy centrally-located office, extra time off on your birthday, and many other benefits we’ll tell you about when we meet.


Are you ready to be a key player in revolutionizing financial well-being? We can’t wait to receive your application!


We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.

**Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.**
company_description: We're the rebels of the financial industry, putting an end to overpriced financial products. We push the envelope of fintech and financial health!

title: Full-Stack Developer (AI)
description:
**About Telavox**  

We are a fast-growing and innovative mobile operator for businesses, transforming how companies communicate and engage with customers. Our platform seamlessly combines telephony, PBX, and ticket management into a user-friendly app that easily integrates with other systems. By developing our own technology, we have the freedom to create the best possible customer experience — and that’s exactly what we do.


Since our journey began around 20 years ago, we have expanded to 500 employees across 9 countries. At Telavox, you’ll join a dynamic, ever-evolving company with plenty of opportunities to grow and make an impact!

**Why join us?**  

Telavox is at the forefront of an exciting period of growth, leveraging AI technology to redefine our product portfolio. We are committed to empowering our customers with state-of-the-art AI voice technology through intuitive, out-of-the-box solutions. This is your chance to be part of a pioneering team that is shaping the future of communication.

**About the Role ‍**  

We are looking for a **Full-Stack Developer** to join our Product & Commercial team. This role plays a crucial part in improving our self-serve customer journey for B2B administrators and end-users, driving product-led growth.  

  

You will work at the intersection of engineering, product & commercial, and sales, creating tools and frameworks for our newest product, the “AI Receptionist.” Your mission: automate the customer journey at scale and unlock the potential of our AI product portfolio.

**Key responsibilities:**

* Innovate and Implement: Develop full product features (both frontend and backend) that significantly impact user acquisition, upsell existing customers, and create a scalable onboarding and in-life journey.
* Create Vertical-Specific Features: Design unique product features and selling points tailored to specific market needs.
* Build Scalable Models: Develop integration models for customers and partners, enhancing connectivity and efficiency.

**Who you are**  

We are seeking a technically proficient colleague with a passion for developing cutting-edge AI products within the Telecom sector. If you are someone who:

* Possesses full-stack engineering skills with a frontend focus.
* Has a strong product sense and an interest in growth and business.
* Brings experience in launching or scaling products.
* Is skilled in analytics and experimentation tools.
* Has design skills and a passion for AI.
* Is highly motivated, driven, and thrives on solving complex challenges.
* Consistently delivers high-quality work and exceeds expectations.
* Takes initiative, works autonomously, and prioritizes learning and contribution.

**Become Part of Telavox!**


Are you ready to join us on an exciting journey and be at the forefront of innovation in AI and communication? Join us and be part of a team that is not just building products but revolutionizing the way businesses communicate. Your future awaits at Telavox!  

  

For any questions, reach out to hiring manager Alexander Hagring alexander.hagring@telavox.com.

title: Senior Fullstack-utvecklare
description:

title: Java - Utvecklare - Test Automation & CI
description:
Har du vad som krävs för att lyckas i IT-konsultvärlden? VIPAS AB söker nya talanger för spännande projekt inom telekom, automotive, retail och bank!

**Om VIPAS:**  

Föreställ dig en värld där din affärsteknik är sömlöst anpassad till dina mål – effektiv, skalbar och innovativ. På VIPAS AB är detta vår vision och drivkraft. Vi är mer än ett IT-konsultföretag – vi är din strategiska partner för att utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar med den senaste tekniken, såsom Java och Python. Med djup expertis inom mjukvaruutveckling, DevOps och ingenjörskonst säkerställer vårt erfarna team att du navigerar den moderna teknikens landskap med trygghet, innovation och långsiktig framgång.

**Jobbeskrivning:**

  

Som **Java-utvecklare** kommer du att arbeta med **testautomation och CI/CD**, där du bidrar till att förbättra och optimera testprocesser. Du kommer att använda verktyg som **Eclipse/IntelliJ, Maven, Jenkins och JIRA** och samarbeta med utvecklare och testingenjörer för att säkerställa hög kvalitet i leveranserna.

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**

  

* Arbeta med **test automation och continuous Integration (CI)** för att förbättra och optimera testprocesser.
* Använd verktyg som **Eclipse/IntelliJ, Maven, Jenkins och JIRA** för utveckling och testning.
* Samarbeta med **utvecklare och testingenjörer** för att säkerställa hög kvalitet i leveranserna.
* Fokusera på att öka **effektivitet och tillförlitlighet** i mjukvarutestning och distribution.

**Kravprofil:**

* Minst 3–7 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling, med fokus på testautomation.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-processer och relevanta verktyg.
* God förståelse för automatiserad testning och utvecklingsmetodik.
* Erfarenhet av Eclipse/IntelliJ, Maven, Jenkins och Jira.
* Förmåga att arbeta på plats i Stockholm
* Flytande svenska och engelska
* Möjlighet att genomgå och godkännas i en säkerhetsprövning nivå 2

**Varför jobba hos oss?**  

VIPAS AB erbjuder attraktiva anställningspaket för IT-konsulter, i enlighet med Teknikföretagens (Almega) kollektivavtal. Att arbeta med oss innebär möjligheter inom olika branscher, vilket ger dig flexibilitet och möjligheter till utveckling. Om du är drivande och redo att anta nya utmaningar, är VIPAS familjen för dig!  

Du kommer att vara en del av ett innovativt team som driver framtiden inom telekom, fordon, detaljhandel och bank. Om du är redo att ta dig an utmanande projekt och växa i en banbrytande miljö, är detta möjligheten för dig!

**Ansök nu**  

Tveka inte att kontakta oss på **swati@vipas.se**

**Observera**: Ansök gärna om du har permanent uppehållstillstånd, svenskt medborgarskap eller ett giltigt arbetstillstånd för Sverige.

**Hur ansöker du:**  

Intresserade kandidater uppmanas att skicka in sitt CV och personliga brev. Gå med oss och driv innovation på VIPAS AB!


Observera att vi rekryterar löpande, vilket innebär att uppdraget kan stängas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Om du är intresserad rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omedelbart!

title: Frontend Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

We are looking for a developer who can primarily work on creating self-service templates based on backstage.io scaffolder and contribute to the development of custom ReactJS components. Knowledge of automation (Ansible, AWX, VMWare Aria) is also important for certain automation tasks.  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* React
* Javascript
* Backstage
* YAML
* Ansible
* Automation skills

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 03-04-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior embeddedutvecklare för framtidens hållbara arbetsfordon
description:
Om företaget
  
Avaron AB är ett konsultföretag med fokus på teknisk innovation och utveckling. Vi arbetar i nära samarbete med våra kunder för att skapa hållbara och högpresterande lösningar inom bland annat elektronik, mjukvaruutveckling och produktdesign. Vi värdesätter samarbete, nytänkande och en stark tro på att de bästa resultaten nås genom engagerade medarbetare med stort tekniskt intresse.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
I detta uppdrag kommer du att arbeta som konsult hos en av våra kunder, som utvecklar morgondagens elektriska och hybridbaserade arbetsfordon. Du ingår i ett team av cirka 16 specialister som tillsammans ansvarar för att ta fram hela den inbyggda plattformen – från design och prototyper till slutlig implementering.
  
  

**Din huvudfokus blir att:**  

Utforma och vidareutveckla mjukvara för styrning av PMSM/BLDC-motorer i C (samt viss användning av assembler).
  
Medverka från idéstadie till serieproduktion, med allt från prototypframtagning till testning och felsökning i labbmiljö.
  
Samarbeta tätt med kollegor inom både el och mekanik för att säkerställa att systemen uppfyller såväl funktionskrav som säkerhetsstandarder.
  
Dokumentera tekniska lösningar, delta i kravhantering och bidra till att möta produktmål gällande driftsäkerhet och prestanda.
  
  

Du kommer att arbeta i en miljö präglad av korta beslutsvägar och stor frihet i hur teamet driver utvecklingen. Här förväntas du ta en aktiv roll i att förbättra produkterna och testa nya idéer – alltid med fokus på hållbarhet, innovation och långsiktig kvalitet.
  
Kvalifikationer (Ska-krav)
  
Minst 8 års erfarenhet av att utveckla inbyggd mjukvara för styrning av PMSM/BLDC-motorer.
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i C för realtidsprogrammering.
  
God förmåga till felsökning och mätning i elektronikmiljö, inklusive testkörning av hårdvara.
  
Strukturerad och analytisk läggning, med vana att arbeta kravstyrt och dokumentera lösningar.
  
Obehindrad kommunikation på engelska (tal och skrift).
  
  

Meriterande (Bra att ha)
  
Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning med inriktning mot teknik.
  
Erfarenhet av snabb prototypframtagning och sena projektförändringar.
  
Kunskaper i C# för utveckling av felsökningsverktyg.
  
Kännedom om produktsäkerhetskrav och standarder.
  
Förmåga att skriva tydlig teknisk dokumentation på engelska.
  
Goda kunskaper i svenska språket.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Vi behandlar ansökningarna löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Skicka därför in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Mejla ditt personliga brev och CV till jobb@avaron.se och märk mejlet med ”Senior embeddedutvecklare för framtidens hållbara arbetsfordon (13068)”.
  
Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Java Backend developer - Volvo Group Connected Solutions
description:
**Do you want to be part of a global organization leading the development of the Volvo Group’s connected services and solutions? For us, “connected for efficiency, sustainability and safety” is much more than a tag-line. If this sounds interesting to you, keep on reading!**

  

At Volvo Group Connected Solutions we work at the forefront of connectivity with data from over 1 500 000 Volvo Group customer assets. Together with customers, partners and the Volvo Group we create real value, not only for our customers but also for society at large.

**This is us, your new colleagues**
-----------------------------------


Volvo Group Connected Solutions is a software company within the Volvo Group. We are around 700 highly skilled employees, working at the forefront of vehicle connectivity.  

By collecting, analyzing and using data from 1.5 Million+ connected vehicles, we make the world of transportation safer, cleaner, and more efficient. Add electrification and automation to the mix, and we are shaping the future of transportation.

  

Our main hub and office is located in Lindholmen, Gothenburg, but we also have offices in Silicon Valley and Greensboro in the US, Curitiba in Brazil, Bangalore in India and China.

 **The role**

  

We are looking for an experienced Java backend developer and are looking for curious minds that love innovation and are interested in the future of mobility. You will be part of a diverse DevOps team that works in two-week sprints and in ten-week program increments.

**About you**
-------------


We are now looking to expand the team with a Senior Java backend developer stationed in Gothenburg. You have experience in DevOps and preferably in Telecom.

 **In summary you have:**

* At least 5 years of experience in backend Java programming, preferably using technologies like Spring Boot, JMS, RelDb (or similar tools) and AWS (Serverless, nodeJ)
* Solid experience in using Unix, Linux
* Experience from Test-driven development (TDD)
* Experience of Agile way of working

 **Good:**

* Understanding of scalability and experience of load tests
* Understanding of Micro services architecture and design

 **Merits:**

* Experience in UDP, Binary SMS and sat-com
* Experience n ASN1
* Experience in Automotive industry and connectivity.

  

Any additional knowledge of connected applications, CI/CD, CDK, Code Pipelines, Docker, Serverless development, load testing and application profiling is a bonus. We put the emphasis on who you are as a person, and we believe that your personality is the major reason for you to succeed in this role.

  

You are required to be working a few days at our office in Lindholmen per week.

**What can we offer you?**
--------------------------

You will be part of a highly motivated and multi-cultural team that creates great results through awesome people with deep skills. We believe that teamwork is the key to success, and we have a culture where people love to support and help each other.

  

Welcome to the heart of connectivity at Volvo Group Connected Solutions!

 **Want to know more? Contact us!**  

  

Torbjörn Karlsson, Manager Connectivity Services, +46 765536186

  

Last application date for this opportunity is 2025-04-20

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group.** Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

  

At **Volvo Group Connected Solutions**we drive transportation forward through connectivity. Our services and solutions are the key to a connected and more productive infrastructure, to ensure safer transport and reduced carbon emissions. By leveraging massive amounts of data from our customers connected assets, we are leading the way in a rapidly changing industry.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: ADAS Function Developer - Collision Prevention
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**What you will do**
--------------------

*As a member of the Collision Prevention team, your main tasks will be:*

* Contribute with your skills, experience and personality; in an agile and high performing team - delivering state-of-the-art Advanced Driving Assistance Systems.
* Algorithm and software development for decision and control, path planning, situation assessment and more.
* Trouble shooting, testing and integration.
* Writing use cases, requirements and test cases on different levels as well as defining KPIs and participating in developing data-driven evaluation methods.

 **Your future team**


We have the responsibility to develop and maintain Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) for the full life cycle for commercial trucks.

  

The team is responsible for software development of all functionalities preventing collision, e.g. Automatic Emergency Brake, in all directions and conditions.

**Who are you?**
----------------


We don’t know you yet, but we believe that you are a structured and analytical person with a ‘can-do’ attitude. You are solution-oriented and thrive in a collaborative environment, where you can build strong relationships and work cross-functionally. Your clear communication and ability to create trust make you an appreciated team player. You enjoy exchanging ideas, discussing solutions and sharing knowledge with colleagues to drive progress. With curiosity and adaptability, you embrace change with a positive mindset and always strive for continuous improvement.

 *Competence requirements (With +5 years work experience in the following):*

* University degree in engineering physics, automation, signal processing, electronics, mechatronics, computer science or similar.
* Developing and delivering production software for automotive and/or ADAS functionality using C/C++, MATLAB and Simulink.
* Control systems, algorithms, signal processing and filter design.
* Software architecture, design, requirement handling, testing and reviewing.
* Systems modelling and simulation.
* Vehicle dynamics and control.

 *Additional competences and tools:*

* Tools: JIRA, GIT/Gerrit, Polyspace, CANalyzer/CANoe.
* Process skills: Functional safety, ISO 26262, ASPICE.
* Truck driver's license.
**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------

**Location:** Campus Lundby Gothenburg, Sweden.

 **Last application date:** April 25th, 2025.

 **The hiring manager for this position is Peter Ankerson, Group Manager Collision Prevention.**

 **But for information about the recruitment process, please contact** Elif Saglik, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elif.saglik@volvo.com.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare till Sigma Industry Innovation AB
description:
**Om tjänsten**


Som mjukvaruutvecklare inom försvarsindustrin kommer du inte bara möta tekniska utmaningar, du kommer också ha möjlighet att utvecklas långsiktigt i en bransch som bidrar till samhällets säkerhet. Teknikstacken är stor och produkterna är komplexa, men det finns stora möjligheter att själv påverka lösningar och teknikval, samt ett stort utrymme för innovation. Du kommer att arbeta med design, utveckling och integration av avancerade system för högteknologiska försvarsapplikationer. Varje dag på jobbet kommer vara viktig och du kommer kunna göra skillnad för allas trygghet.

**Är du den vi söker?**


Vi letar efter dig som har en ingenjörsexamen inom relevant område, till exempel mektronik, robotik, datateknik, elektroteknik eller liknande.


Vi söker dig som:

  

* Har ett genuint intresse för att skapa framtidens tekniska lösningar inom försvarsindustrin
* Du är en lagspelare som gärna stöttar andra och delar med dig av din kunskap
* Mycket goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift
* Svenskt medborgarskap
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, gärna inom C++
* Möjlighet att arbeta på plats hos kund i Karlskoga eller Arboga, 100 % av arbetstiden

**Söker du oss?**


Vi är ett team av engagerade ingenjörer som stöttar varandra och delar kunskap för att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar. Vi har roligt på jobbet, högt i tak och ett engagerande klimat. Du står aldrig ensam inför en utmaning utan kan bolla idéer och hitta möjligheter tillsammans med dina kollegor.


Som konsult på Sigma får du möjligheten att arbeta i spännande projekt inom flera branscher, där du antingen är på plats hos kund eller på Sigmas kontor via satellit- och in-houseprojekt. Vi har projekt inom bland annat fordonsindustrin, försvarsindustrin, Life Science, låsindustrin, konsumentprodukter, livsmedel och elektrifiering. Vi är i ständig rörelse och utforskar ständigt nya teknologiska områden. Hos oss kan du hitta det just du brinner för.

  

Det finns mycket att berätta om Sigma Industry Innovation AB, våra värderingar och vår verksamhet. Hos oss är ingenjören hjälten, och tekniken vårt hjärta. Vi drivs av digitalisering och nyfikenhet, och som en del av ett entreprenörsdrivet bolag med korta beslutsvägar har du stor möjlighet att påverka både din egen och företagets resa. Oavsett om du vill bli expert inom ditt befintliga område, växa in i ett nytt eller engagera dig internt på Sigma. Möjligheterna är oändliga och hos oss får du allt i ett: en trygg anställning, en stimulerande vardag och en skräddarsydd framtid. Låter vi som en perfect match?


Läs gärna mer om vår verksamhet på sigmaindustryeastnorth.se

 **Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!**

**Placering:** Örebro

 **Tillträde:** Enligt överenskommelse.


Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan i dag.

**Välkommen med din ansökan!**


Blev du nyfiken och vill veta mer? Hör av dig så berättar jag mer.


Du når mig på **lotta.asplund@right-on.se**

title: ADAS Function Developer
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**What you will do**
--------------------


As a member of the Driver Support Function group, your main tasks will be:

* Algorithm development for decision and control, path planning, situation assessment and more.
* Trouble shooting and integration.
* Writing use cases, requirements and test cases on different levels as well as defining KPIs and participating in developing data-driven evaluation methods.

 **Your future team**


We have the responsibility to develop and maintain Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) for the full life cycle for commercial trucks.

  

Examples of features being developed by our team are Driver Alert Support (driver monitoring, distraction warnings), Pilot Assist, as well as other Lane Keeping features (such as Lane Keeping Assist, Emergency Steering).

**Who are you?**
----------------


We don’t know you yet, but we believe that you are a structured and analytical person with a ‘can-do’ attitude. You are solution-oriented and thrive in a collaborative environment, where you can build strong relationships and work cross-functionally. Your clear communication and ability to create trust make you an appreciated team player. You enjoy exchanging ideas, discussing solutions, and sharing knowledge with colleagues to drive progress. With curiosity and adaptability, you embrace change with a positive mindset and always strive for continuous improvement.

  

As for educational background, you have a master’s degree in engineering physics, automation, signal processing, electronics, mechatronics, computer science or similar. You have five years of experience as an Automotive Function Developer, preferably within ADAS.

 *Additionally, you have experience and interest in several of the following areas:*

* Embedded systems and software development in C++, MATLAB and Simulink.
* Software Architecture and system design.
* Systems modeling and simulation.
* Sensor Data Fusion.
* Control systems, algorithms, signal processing and filter design.
* Vehicle dynamics and control.
* Functional safety and ISO 26262.
* Agile development.
**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------

**Location:** Gothenburg, Sweden.

 **Last application date:** April 11th, 2025.

 **For information about the recruitment process, contact** Elif Saglik, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elif.saglik@volvo.com.

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Test Automation Developer
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**What you will do**
--------------------


As a Test Automation Developer, you will be part of a team of skilled engineers with responsibility to develop the test cases at the system level, which is based on EUF (end-user function) requirements of the products and fault tracing of the test results. We're seeking individuals with some experience in Automotive and C++. This will give you an excellent opportunity to broaden your knowledge at the System Level within automation.

 *Key responsibilities:*

* Develop new test cases based on the product requirements.
* Fault tracing failures to determine if the failure comes from the testing method, the test environment, or the product.
* Continuously work with improvement on our ability to create a better product.

 **Your future team**


We are the Test Automation team in the section called Product Integration, within Vehicle Software Factory in Volvo Group Trucks Technology. The team has as mission to provide a tool chain for automated tests of truck software. We are also together with other teams developing test cases that will be run fully automated on Trucks and in our Hardware-In-the-Loop-rigs.

**Who are you?**
----------------


We believe that it is the right mindset that will make a difference within our organization. You are a self-motivated person with a positive and can-do attitude. With good communication skills, you are able to influence people and get your message across. You are structured, use analytical thinking and rational reasoning to solve problems. With your strong technical passion and drive, you face change, ambiguity and, complexity with curiosity and are willing to look forward. Most of all, you believe in the power of collaboration between diverse teams to bring new and innovative ideas to the table.

 *Requirements:*


University degree in Software Engineering, or other relevant education.


Programming/development experience in C++ and C#, within the automotive industry. System level knowledge is meritorious.


Experience from requirement interpretation to test case implementation.

**What’s in it for you?**
-------------------------


We can offer you the opportunity to work together with highly skilled colleagues in an exciting, global environment, which provides opportunities to develop both professionally and personally. Our daily work is performed in an international environment giving the opportunity to interact with highly committed colleagues from different cultures. We trust the individual and act as a team, stay close to the product and provide opportunities for professional and personal growth.

 **Last application date:** April 9th, 2025.

 **Location:** Gothenburg, Sweden.

Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

title: DevOps-utvecklare
description:
*Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.*

**Rollen**


I rollen som konsult och DevOps-utvecklare blir du en nyckelperson i våra kunders digitala satsningar. Du kommer jobba med allt från automatisering av test- och deployprocesser till implementering av övervakningslösningar och säkerhet. Här får du möjlighet att vara med och påverka kundens tekniska riktning och säkerställa en snabb, stabil och säker produktionsmiljö.

  

Som konsult hos oss blir du en viktig del i våra kunders digitala transformation och hjälper dem att bygga robusta, skalbara och automatiserade lösningar.

**Erfarenhet**

* Flera års erfarenhet inom DevOps.
* Designa och implementera CI/CD pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med containerteknologier som Docker och Kubernetes.
* God kunskap inom molnplattformar (AWS, Azure eller GCP).
* Goda kunskaper inom Python eller Java.

**Varför ska du välja oss?**


Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.

**Om Castra**


Castra är en entreprenörsdriven konsultgrupp inom IT, management och systemutveckling. Bolaget ägs gemensamt av medarbetarna och tillsammans bygger vi det företag vi själva vill jobba på.


Vår vision är att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för konsulter. Att vi blivit certifierade av Great Place to Work fem år i rad är ett bevis på våra höga mål kring företagskultur. Våra tankar om delaktighet, påverkansmöjligheter och respekt för individens egna val och möjligheter fungerar.


Företaget har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida www.castra.se.

title: Senior Baseband Developer
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

When joining at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead, and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.


Together with your team you will be responsible from pre-study to customer acceptance for new functionality, together with maintenance of current products. The team systemizes, designs and tests the software and takes joint responsibility for all team tasks.

 **What you will do:**

  

Your focus will be in Physical layer (L1) parts of the Baseband SW, vital building blocks in our market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution and in future within 6G. Together with your fellow baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C/C++, Python.
* Participate in the study, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and, in the near future, within 6G.
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.

 **The skills you bring:**

* + A Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* Several years of industry experience preferably within telecom or similar industry working with embedded software development.
* Good knowledge in embedded software development with a special interest in the C/C++ programming language for real time systems.

title: Senior Logistics Developer - Vara plant
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.


Are you ready to be part of a world-leading company focused on sustainable power solutions? This is your opportunity to join our dynamic team at the Vara plant, home to around 250 talented employees. As a global supplier and manufacturing site, we specialize in delivering marine and stationary engines with accessories to customers worldwide.

  

At Volvo Penta, we believe that success comes from a collaborative, engaged, and fun work environment. As a member of our team, you will work alongside a diverse group of professionals who are passionate about what they do and value our culture, benefits, diversity, and development opportunities.

  

The Vara plant is in a crucial phase of growth and transformation, where we are continuously improving existing processes, IT solutions, and embracing new technologies to meet the challenges and opportunities of the future. We are expanding our team and looking for a Logistic Developer to help drive this transformation.

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------


As a Logistic Developer, you will play a crucial role in the transformation of our plant by developing and improving logistics solutions and processes. You will work closely with various departments, including Engineering and Digital & IT, to break down business needs into actionable requirements and solutions. Your responsibilities will include testing, implementing, and supporting new processes and IT systems, ensuring their smooth integration with existing operations.

  

In addition, you will act as a key user, supporting daily operations from the start of the order process to the delivery of the final product. You will manage data and administration related to orders, software, and cycle counting within the plant. Lastly, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute to our ongoing lean journey by helping improve and develop current setups, ensuring we are continuously evolving and optimizing our processes.

**What We’re Looking For:**
---------------------------

* Strong collaboration and networking skills to work effectively with colleagues at all levels and across various functions.
* A self-driven, analytical mindset with a passion for playing a key role in shaping the future of the plant and its processes.
* A degree in Information Technology, Engineering, Logistics, or equivalent experience, with preferably some background in production, ERP, IT, or process development.
* Fluent in both Swedish and English.

 **Why Join Us?**

* Be part of an exciting transformation as we embrace new technologies and innovative solutions.
* Work in a collaborative and engaging environment where your input truly matters.
* Access to growth and development opportunities in a leading global company.
* Contribute to making a positive impact on sustainable power solutions.
**Interested?**
---------------

Apply today and help us shape the future of logistics at Volvo Penta’s Vara plant! For more information, feel free to contact:

  

Sven Andersson, Director Logistics; 0765-533514  

Evamari Lönn Hällsås, Director People and Culture, 0739-021548

  

Last application date: April 13

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Volvo Penta**, a world-leading supplier of engines and complete drive systems for marine and industrial applications, you will be part of a global and diverse team of highly skilled professionals who works with passion, trust each other and embraces change to stay ahead. We make our customers win.

title: Baseband Developer
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

  

We are currently seeking young and curious professionals with 2-6 years of industry experience who want to be part of Radio Baseband software development for 5G and 6G.

  

About this opportunity:

  

When joining at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead, and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you're welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.

  

Together with your team you will be responsible from pre-study to customer acceptance for new functionality, together with maintenance of current products. The team systemizes, designs and tests the software and takes joint responsibility for all team tasks.

  

What you will do:


Your focus will be in Physical layer (L1) parts of the Baseband SW, vital building blocks in our market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution and in future within 6G. Together with your fellow baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C, Python.
* Participate in the study, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and, in the near future, within 6G.
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.
**Join our Team**
-----------------

  

We’re excited to see you bring some or all the following:

* A Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* 2 - 6 years of industry experience, preferably within telecom or similar industry working with embedded software development.
* Curiosity, desire, and skills to be a great embedded software developer with a special interest in the C programming language for real time systems.
* Knowledge and experience in 5G and 4G wireless communication e.g. 3GPP specifications.
* Experience with signal processing, RF or air interface measurements, multi-core DSP processor programming in areal-time environment and design patterns in an embedded environment.
* A forward-thinking, hardworking, and creative personality. We love extraordinary teammates who enjoy a fast-paced work environment and adopts challenge.
* Dedication and a genuine interest in the latest technology trends and a passion to solve complex problems no one else has solved before.


You have an open mind and like to take on new challenges to continuously improve, and to work outside your own field to broaden your competence and get a deeper understanding of our products.

  

We will proceed with the applications as they come so leave you application soonest!

  

Why join Ericsson?

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and creativity to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next. Ericsson is dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive environment, where everyone can thrive and bring their unique perspectives.

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 200 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We are looking for a Frontend Developer with 3+ years of experience to join our in-house technology team. As part of our journey toward innovation and scaling, you’ll play an important role in building and optimizing the technical platform that drives our business.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity for a driven and collaborative developer who thrives in a fast-paced environment. You will contribute to developing and maintaining features for our e-commerce platform while growing your technical skills alongside experienced colleagues.
   

  

 Our frontend architecture is built on a custom TypeScript framework, seamlessly integrated with a .NET Core backend. We use Webpack, TypeScript, and Less to deliver cutting-edge solutions for our e-commerce platform.
   

  

 As a part of the Haypp Group Tech team, you’ll be joining a collaborative group of 11 tech enthusiasts who value innovation, knowledge sharing, and an open culture where every idea counts.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Develop, implement, and maintain features for our e-commerce platform.
* Collaborate with the team and stakeholders to deliver quality solutions aligned with business needs.
* Contribute to platform optimization and performance improvements.
* Participate in team discussions and contribute innovative ideas for technical solutions.
* Embrace challenges, engage in continuous learning, and grow as a developer.


**What We Want From You**
 We want you to succeed and thrive within this role and our team. Here’s what we’re looking for:
   

  

 3+ years of professional experience in frontend development.
   

  

 Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frontend, and experience building modern frontend web solutions.
   

  

 Hands-on experience with SASS or LESS, and tools like Webpack.
   

  

 Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
   

  

 Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with technical and non-technical team members.
   

  

 Fluency in English, which is the working language at Haypp Group.
   

  

**Bonus Skills That Make You Stand Out:**
* Familiarity with backend technologies, particularly .NET Core.
* Experience working with B2C e-commerce platforms or other consumer-facing applications.
* Knowledge of cloud services or DevOps practices.
* A willingness to take on new challenges and grow your technical expertise.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 ***Inclusion & Non-Hierarchy***
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Viktoria Sobolewski at viktoria.sobolewski@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 950 000 consumers.

title: Java Developer
description:
**About Kambi**
*Kambi Group plc is a leading B2B provider of premium sports betting services to licensed gaming operators. Our services provide an end-to-end solution for operators wanting to launch a standalone Sportsbook or bolster their existing offering with an innovative sports betting product. From front-end user interface to customer intelligence, risk management and odds compiling, all built on our in-house developed software, we strive to deliver the ultimate service and solution to our partners.*
*Our vision is to create the world’s leading sports betting experiences, together with our partners.*
 With offices in Malta (HQ), Philadelphia, London, Bucharest, Manila, Sydney, Uppsala and Stockholm we are +950 passionate and highly skilled people working at Kambi. We believe in a diverse and flexible environment. Our core values are: Better, Faster, Together. These core values are reflected throughout our whole organization as well as towards our partners. We strive to have a diverse work environment as we believe it makes us a strong organization.
   

  

**The Role:**
 We are looking for Java Developers with all levels of experience to further strengthen our development teams' ability to turn user stories into shippable code. To succeed in the role, we believe that you have previous experience with building scalable and maintainable applications that run and fail gracefully. You should have both theoretical and practical knowledge of agile and/or lean software development.
   

  

 Kambi are strong believers of self-organized teams, and you will be part of a cross-functional, self-organizing & self-managing team. Together with the team you will participate in team discussions, grooming's, retrospectives with the goal of improving our product and processes. You will take part in discussions with our Product Owners to give technical insight, as well as trouble-shoot and solve production incidents in a complex environment.
   

  

 Some of the tools and frameworks we use in the backend teams:
   

  

 Java / Kotlin, Spring framework, REST/Json, Linux, AWS, Helm, Kubernetes, Apache Kafka, Git
   

  

 We operate in DevOps teams, meaning you'll have the opportunity to take full ownership of all aspects of our products and components, from idea to deployment/support.
   

  

 At Kambi we believe in the importance of work-life-balance and making that culture part of our day-to-day. We believe that you as well as Kambi benefit from having happy, healthy colleagues.
   

  

 You will join one of our Stockholm-based development teams with a hybrid work setup.
   

  

 To fit well in our teams, you should have a curious mindset, be triggered by challenges and love to be part of a team. You are passionate about development and always eager to learn new things. As we are an international and multinational company, our main language is English.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 An opportunity to work in a successful and fast-growing, international company. We operate in AWS cloud and we can offer an exciting environment where you can grow and learn.
   

  

 You will join a dedicated team where you will be able to directly influence the work environment and processes. We also believe in an encouraging environment, and we embrace diversity.
   

  

 At Kambi, we encourage learning and provide opportunities for our team members to develop their skills and knowledge. We offer internal trainings, participation in industry conferences, organize hackathons and other collaborative events. We believe that the best way to achieve our mission is to foster a culture of continuous learning and development.
   

  

 We are curious about your story, if you are interested in meeting us please apply with your CV.
   

  

 #wearekambi
   

  

***Kambi's ongoing commitment to Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace***
*If you require any reasonable adjustment during the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter, who will assist you however they can. Diversity and inclusion is at the heart of who we are and who we aim to be. While we are proud of the positive and inclusive company culture we have created, we know we can do so much more. Kambi constantly evolves its Diversity and Inclusion strategy to ensure it becomes an even more inclusive and positive place to work, with the core management team reaffirming its commitment to delivering on employee feedback.*
***Creating an inclusive environment***
*We believe Kambi's greatest strength is the collective talent of our employees. Kambi is committed to ensuring we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can feel valued, thrive and achieve their potential, regardless of who they are or what their background is. We know that it is only by having a balance of different voices, values and opinions that Kambi is able to be the market leader it is today.*
*#wearekambi*
