title: Senior Azure Specialist (Cloud Infra)
description:
**S E N I O R A Z U R E S P E C I A L I S T
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent
   

  

**A B O U T X E N I T**
 Xenit is a growth company which specializes in Cloud and modern work. Our committed employees inspire, challenge and encourage each other, while providing extensive value for our customers. Xenit is
 **Microsoft's Partner of the Year, Sweden** 
 for 2024, illustrating our commitment to technical development, being on the cutting edge of tech, and our close partnership with Microsoft 🚀
   

  

**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 We are looking for a driven
 **Senior** 
**Azure Specialist** 
 to join Xenit's Cloud Infrastructure Team. We are interested in someone who has been working within this sphere for a good few years now... Maybe someone who comes from a traditional on-prem world and then found their way to Azure, automation, IaC and other exciting technologies?
   

  

 We'd ideally like to see someone who has experience with transition and transformation projects, and feels confident in their knowledge and expertise.
   

  

**Examples Of Potential Tasks**
* Customer projects vary from: Implementing Enterprise Scale to Transition and Transformation projects
* Guiding customers on their Cloud journey
* Deployment and configuration with Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Working with our CloudOps service for our customers; responding to more complex tickets assigned to the team.


**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next Azure Specialist Has**
* Preferably 5+ years of experience with Azure


 (we can be flexible with this based on how much hands on techie work you have done)
   

  

* A technical breadth of experience within Infrastructure - Windows Server, AD, SQL, Networking and Security
* Worked with IaaS and PaaS
* Experience with Cloud Migration and Transformation Projects
* Knowledge about Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure


**It Is a Bonus If You Have**
* Automation/Scripting Experience
* Terraform
* Azure DevOps
* Certifications: AZ-104, AZ-305, Terraform Associate


**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
* Is fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes responsibility for their work
* Genuinely loves tech and is passionate about learning 🧠
* Collaborates effectively with others and builds good relationships with both customers and colleagues
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do 💕


**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**Benefits**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package - read full list here
   

  

**Super interesting colleagues 🎉**
 With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, art historians, rugby players, puzzle maniacs, film geeks and much more.
   

  

 With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is an incredible drive and passion for what they do.
   

  

**Activities ⛹🏻**
 Each quarter, we have
 **Xenit Inspire** 
 where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centered around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building "after works" and "bring a buddy" lunches 🥪
   

  

 Xenit was also recently awarded
 **"Career Company of 2024"** 
 . This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.
   

  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*
 Read more about Karriar Företagen here.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position or the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact our Head of Talent: Abigail Chapman 💌
   

  

 Read more here: https://xenit.se/
   

  

* Application information may be shared, in some instances, within the co-native group.


 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive - working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment & working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?

title: Senior Vice President, Corporate Solutions
description:
The Apex Group was established in Bermuda in 2003 and is now one of the world’s largest fund administration and middle office solutions providers.
   

  

 Our business is unique in its ability to reach globally, service locally and provide cross-jurisdictional services. With our clients at the heart of everything we do, our hard-working team has successfully delivered on an unprecedented growth and transformation journey, and we are now represented by over circa 13,000 employees across 112 offices worldwide.Your career with us should reflect your energy and passion.
   

  

 That’s why, at Apex Group, we will do more than simply ‘empower’ you. We will work to supercharge your unique skills and experience.
   

  

 Take the lead and we’ll give you the support you need to be at the top of your game. And we offer you the freedom to be a positive disrupter and turn big ideas into bold, industry-changing realities.
   

  

 For our business, for clients, and for you
   

  

**Senior Vice President, Corporate Solutions**
**Role Location: Apex Sweden**
 Department: Corporate Solutions
   

  

 Employment Type: Permanent, Full Time
   

  

**The Role**
 This is a senior operational role within the Corporate Solutions pillar of Apex and has a wide array of responsibilities including, but not limited to, leading a function with responsibility for delivering governance, fiduciary, accounting and administration support.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Manage direct onshore reports and work closely with offshore indirect reports to ensure a high quality and excellently co-ordinated service is delivered to client relationships
* Providing technical support to the administration team on all aspects of client service, particularly with respect to financial accounting and tax
* Oversee the full lifecycle management of corporate structures, from incorporation and formation, to include adherence to AML, day-to-day administration, domiciliation, financial accounting, cash management, and payment processing
* Establish, cultivate and manage strong relationships and networks with intermediaries and internal contacts,
* Lead the Corporate Solutions function locally with responsibility for the development and leadership of the team members
* Attend industry training as is required to ensure that you have and maintain the appropriate technical knowledge required to perform your role and to understand the regulatory obligations to which you are subject to
* Prepare monthly performance reports on service delivery for Group-level review
* Reviewing and preparation of annual financial statements to required standard and deadlines
* Performing and overseeing ongoing accounting activities to ensure accuracy, compliance, and timely reporting.
* Review transaction documents to ensure adherence to regulatory requirements
* To obtain internal and external stakeholder feedback and drive increases in client satisfaction and engagement
* Ensure the timely and accurate resolution of any internal or external issues and ensure effective open and clear communication processes are in place
* Continuously challenge existing practices by promoting efficient use of our systems and processes to enable growth and facilitate the expansion of our capabilities
* To understand relevant accounting standards, laws, practices, treaties, and regulations that underpin our client requirements
* Establish and maintain sound motivational people management practices. Ensure employee development is aligned to business objectives and oversee and measure effective work processes and practices within the team
* Review service delivery against the client fee structure and escalation service creep where applicable
* Coordinating with our Sales team when identifying new business opportunities and or the development of our services
* Any other duties in the scope of the role that the company requires


**Skills required:**
* A minimum of 5 years overall experience in a similar role and at least two years’ experience acting on client entity boards
* A professional accounting qualification and good understanding of both local and international accounting standards and tax regulation
* A track record of developing revenue from new and existing clients
* Excellent networking, communication, organisational and leadership skills
* Proven ability to build and manage a team
* A good understanding of Swedish company law and other related legal and regulatory requirements as well as a working knowledge of relevant Swedish tax issues
* A keen awareness of risk issues in the context of fiduciary responsibilities
* Motivated and driven with an ability to work under pressure to tight deadlines and demanding financial targets
* A willingness to travel as business needs dictate
* An ability to embrace and execute change while providing support to employees through the process


*The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of the work being performed. They are not construed as an exhaustive list of all deliverables, responsibilities and duties. All Apex employees are expected to be flexible in approach and may be required to perform other duties as may be reasonably required for the benefit of the Company, and to add value.*
 Disclaimer: Unsolicited CVs sent to Apex (Talent Acquisition Team or Hiring Managers) by recruitment agencies will not be accepted for this position. Apex operates a direct souring model and where agency assistance is required, the Talent Acquisition team will engage directly with our exclusive recruitment partners.

title: Cloud Support Technician
description:
*Zelly är ett ledande ”born-in-the-cloud” företag . Vi utvecklar och optimerar molntjänster från Microsoft och ser till att våra kunder har tillgång till de bäst lämpade molntjänsterna för deras verksamhet.*
**Nu har du chansen att hänga med på vår tillväxtresa!**
 Vi på Zelly växer och behöver nu en till Cloud Support Technician till Customer Care teamet. Vi söker nu dig som är ambitiös med en positiv inställning. Zelly är ett dynamiskt och snabbväxande Cloud-bolag som levererar alla Microsofts plattformar. Vi har en Cloud first-approach och ser styrkan i att nyttja synergier i Microsofts ekosystem. Zelly är den perfekta arbetsplatsen för dig som vill utvecklas, gillar att ta ansvar och ha möjligheten att påverka din arbetsplats. Vi ser att du är hungrig på ny teknik, vill hjälpa kunder till en bättre, enklare och säkrare vardag.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 I supporten har vi daglig kontakt med många av de kunder som använder vår plattform. Kundservice är en central och väsentlig del i vår verksamhet då våra kunders framgång är detsamma som framgång för oss på Zelly. Din främsta uppgift blir att i supporten hantera inkommande ärenden från kunder via ärendehanteringssystem, telefon och mail. Arbetsuppgifterna innebär bland annat felsökning i en Windowsmiljö, konto- och behörighetshantering i Active Directory, Azure AD, Office 365, problemlösning för skrivare, nätverk, dokumentation och en hel del annat. Komplexiteten av ärenden varierar mycket och utvecklingsmöjligheterna är stora.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Erfarenhet av att jobba i Servicedesk med IT-support eller teknisk support
* Kunskap inom exempelvis Windows Server, Active Directory, Azure, Office 365, nätverk & hårdvara
* Strukturerad och organiserad
* förmågan att uttrycka sig väl i tal och skrift både på svenska och engelska
* Genuin passion för IT och digitalisering
* Van att ha mycket kundkontakt


**För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du:**
* Är intresserad av cloud produkter och dess utveckling
* Trivs med frihet under ansvar
* Gillar att utveckla rutiner och processer


**Dina möjligheter hos oss:**
* Bra villkor och stora utvecklingsmöjligheter i ett snabbt expanderande IT-bolag!
* Möjlighet till delägarskap i Aderian Group som är koncernen som Zelly ingår i
* Då vårt mål är att du ska bli bäst på molntjänster betalar vi gärna för din fortbildning. För när du utvecklas – utvecklas vi!
* Självklart erbjuder vi både förmåner och bonusar
* Roliga resor och aktiviteter tillsammans!


 Rekrytering sker löpande – där tillträde och lön sker enligt överenskommelse. Vi kommer att genomföra en bakgrundskontroll som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs!

title: Data Engineer with a Scrum Master sparkle within Custody & Investments Solutions| SEB, Solna
description:
**Interested in shaping the technical roadmap for SEB?** 
 Join our Data & Analytics team as a Data engineer with scrum master responsibilities to help us develop a modern data platform.
   

  

 SEB is a leading financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and customer products because it genuinely makes a huge impact for our customers and colleagues.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are a cloud engineering team responsible for a wide range of data deliveries for reporting and analytical purposes, often driven by legal and regulatory requirements. We are modernizing our platform by transitioning our on-premises functionality to Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and you will play a crucial role in this migration as everyone else in our team. In this position You will regularly communicate and collaborate with colleagues in and out of the team. You will work on the agile ceremonies in the team and drive the PI planning together with our PO. You will contribute to and implement the technical roadmap for data availability within and outside the Savings & Investments area, working closely with architects, product owners, and developers, while onboarding new users to our data products.
   

  

**To Succeed In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* 5+ years of experience in software development
* Proven experience being a scrum master. Knowledge of Safe concept.
* Experience from a cloud or containerized stack with virtual infrastructure, preferably GCP
* A team player personality with skills in collaboration and leadership, used to collaborating in a multicultural environment
* Advanced knowledge of Python and SQL.
* Designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines using technologies such as Google BigQuery, Docker, Pub/Sub, Git and Airflow to name a few.
* Experience with modern data architectures, such as Event-driven, Data Lake, Data Warehouse and Lake House.
* Experience with modern data modelling techniques like Dimensional Modelling and Data Vault.
* Excellent English skills


**What We Offer**
* Working with skilled, caring, passionate and progressive team members
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Innovative company in forefront of technology
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?** 
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 2025-04-11. If you have questions about the position, please contact hiring manager Mervan Yildiz, at mervan.yildiz@seb.se, but we will not be able to process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: IT Support Technician till Cary Group
description:
Är du en serviceinriktad och tekniskt kunnig person som brinner för att hjälpa användare och lösa IT-relaterade problem? Vill du vara en del av ett internationellt företag i en expansiv fas?
   

  

 Då kan rollen som IT Support Technician på Cary Group vara något för dig!
   

  

**Din vardag:**
 Som IT Support Technician Cary Group kommer du att spela en central roll i att stödja våra användare och säkerställa att IT-miljön fungerar smidigt. Du arbetar både självständigt och i samarbete med IT-avdelningen, verksamheten och externa leverantörer för att hantera tekniska utmaningar och förbättra IT-tjänster.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:
   

  

* Ge teknisk support och hjälp till användare för att lösa problem med hårdvara, mjukvara och nätverk.
* Hantera och eskalera ärenden inom helpdesk och säkerställa snabb och effektiv återkoppling.
* Installera, konfigurera och uppdatera programvara på användares enheter enligt organisationens riktlinjer.
* Hjälpa användare med nätverksanslutning och felsökning av uppkopplingsproblem.
* Utföra säkerhetskopiering av data och hjälpa till med återställning vid behov.
* Utbilda användare i användning av IT-system och skapa lösningsguider samt uppdatera dokumentation.
* Bidra till och stödja organisationens systemförvaltning och Cloud transformation
* Vara med att utveckla arbetssätt för att kunna jobba smartare


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av IT-support och en stark vilja att hjälpa andra. Du är en problemlösare som trivs med att arbeta självständigt, men också i samarbete med andra. Du har en god teknisk förståelse och förmågan att kommunicera tekniska begrepp på ett enkelt och tydligt sätt.
   

  

 Du är serviceinriktad och lyhörd för användarnas behov, med tålamod och empati vid hantering av deras problem och frågor. Du har en flexibel inställning och kan anpassa dig till förändrade arbetsuppgifter och prioriteringar. Som person är du organiserad och noggrann i dokumentation och registrering av användarförfrågningar. Du har dessutom en genuin passion för teknik och drivs av att hjälpa andra att dra nytta av dess fördelar.
   

  

 Vi ser att du har:
   

  

* Grundläggande kunskaper inom datorhårdvara, operativsystem och vanlig programvara.
* God kännedom inom Microsoft 365 och Azure.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en helpdesk eller IT-supportroll.
* Starka felsöknings- och problemlösningsförmågor.
* Goda kommunikations- och samarbetsförmågor.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt.
* Grundläggande kunskaper om nätverk och internetprotokoll (IP) är meriterande.
* Ett starkt intresse för teknik och en vilja att utvecklas inom IT-området.


 Språkkunskaper:
   

  

* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Om Cary Group**
 Cary Group är en snabbväxande internationell koncern med en unik mix av entreprenöriell anda och trygg struktur. Vi är en av marknadsledarna i Europa inom reparation och byte av fordonsglas, bussglas samt reparation av plåt- och lackskador. Vi erbjuder tjänster som förlänger fordonens livslängd och bibehåller deras säkerhetsfunktioner, med fokus på att reparera i stället för att byta ut.
   

  

 Vi värnar om vår varma och inkluderande kultur och investerar i aktiviteter och event för att stärka vårt team. Vårt kontor är beläget i Hammarby Sjöstad i Stockholm.
   

  

 För mer information besök: www.carygroup.com
   

  

**Kontakt**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Cary Group med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Sandra Åhs på sandra.ahs@wiseit.se.
   

  

 Vi kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Vi hanterar alla ansökningar löpande och även så urvalet av kandidater som går vidare till intervju.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Regional Sales Manager
description:
Our client is a true unicorn in the making, still pre IPO and backed with a total funding of well over 120M USD to further fuel its growth. Its Cloud Native Application Protection Platform (CNAPP) combines Data Security Posture Management with real time detection and response to data security breaches and violations.
 




  






 We have been retained to assist in the further grow of this stelar organization recruiting some of their top sales and customer facing positions in Europe and the US.
 




  






 Are you that driven and experienced Enterprise Sales Manager with previous successful 10+ years experience in a Cyber Security startup environment , preferable working in a Cloud and SAAS Security related setting ?
 





 A quick leaner with the ability to scale up a business and organisation?
 




  






 This is a true first person in the region position with a close working relationship to the founders and executives. Interested to know more about this or any of the other exciting sales opportunities we are working on ?
 




  






 On offer is a more than competitive renumeration package and a chance to be part shaping this company on its path to success.
 




  






 This is an individual sales contributor position for now.

title: Salesforce Insurance Cloud Architect
description:
We are seeking a Salesforce Industries/Insurance Cloud expert to head up the roll-out of Salesforce Insurance Cloud for a key customer in Sweden.
 



  





 You will standardize and harmonize processes across the region, to achieve consistent user experience, ensuring scalability and efficiency through Salesforce Insurance Cloud.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Lead the harmonization of the business model within Salesforce, ensuring consistency and flexibility for local needs
* Manage Swedish deployment using Salesforce DX, ensuring data integrity and regulatory compliance
* Automate business processes (e.g., claims, underwriting) with Salesforce Flow, Process Builder, and Apex
* Integrate Salesforce with third-party systems for real-time data sync
* Develop custom Apex classes, Lightning Components, and reports tailored to region's needs
* Ensure global security and compliance with Swedish standards



  





**You will have:** 



* Expertise in Salesforce Industries (Vlocity), Salesforce DX, and integrations
* Experience with Swedish financial or Insurance sector Salesforce deployments and understanding Swedish compliance
* Strong skills in automation, security, and custom development
* Proficiency in using OmniStudio for building complex workflows, process automation, and dynamic user interfaces. This includes using tools like OmniScripts, DataRaptors, Integration Procedures, and Vlocity Cards
* Strong understanding of integrating Industries solutions with Salesforce core services, including Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, and Marketing Cloud for a seamless customer experience
* Knowledge in Industries' data models and the ability to integrate external systems with Salesforce Industries using REST, SOAP APIs, and other integration tools like MuleSoft
* Must have understanding of Swedish compliance and security regulations: GDPR, Swedish Data Protection Act (Dataskyddslagen), FSA (Finansinspektionen) Regulations, Solvency II, SOC 2 (System and Organization Controls), Insurance Distribution Directive (IDD) and eIDAS (Electronic Identification and Trust Services)



  





***This role requires you to be on the customer's site 3 days per week, in Stockholm***




***Hourly/Daily rate to be discussed on a phone call with Daniel Indranathan***




  





 This role offers the chance to eventually lead a multi-regional EMEA initiative, enhancing efficiency and collaboration.

title: Customer Success Manager - Public Sector
description:
At Stratsys, we offer a SaaS platform that streamlines compliance in business-critical areas such as sustainability, GRC, and quality work. Unlike other compliance tools, we go a step further by moving organizations from reporting to action and effectively distributing responsibility internally.
 



 We’re looking for a Customer Success Manager to join our team in either Gothenburg or Stockholm. In this role, you’ll work with clients in the public sector and manage a wide range of customer relationships.
 



 As a Customer Success Manager, you’ll focus on both our customers and our platform. You’ll be a main contact for small and large clients and take overall responsibility for their success. This role is all about combining platform knowledge with relationship building, so we’re looking for someone who enjoys working directly with our platform, staying close to customers, and driving growth. A data-driven approach will help you find ways to improve and create strategic solutions that bring real value to our clients.
 



  





**WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? 💡** 



* An engaging work environment with people with a shared mindset to deliver a world-class product in important and impactful areas.
* Work in a crucial and well-established area where we have a strong reputation. The public sector is a key focus for us, with a well-developed pipeline and substantial marketing support.
* Challenging, varied, and engaging work tasks with room and encouragement to be independent and innovative.
* Join a high-energy, close-knit team where every success is celebrated together. Please look at our Instagram to get an insight into our culture.
* Work from a fantastic and central office in one of Hötorgsskraporna in Stockholm or at Kungsportplatsen in Gothenburg.
* Join a company with great benefits – read more about our benefits here!



  





**About The Role 📌** 




 You’ll have a strategic impact by guiding clients from adoption to expansion—a key factor in our growth. Working closely with Project Managers and Sales Specialists, you’ll ensure clients fully utilize the platform, strengthening loyalty and opening doors for further sales.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Build long-term customer relationships based on trust and engagement, working with both senior decision-makers and operational teams.
* Ensure customers achieve their goals and get full value from our platform.
* Assist customers with platform adjustments and improvements.
* Advise customers, raising awareness and interest in our products.
* Develop deep product knowledge to become a trusted advisor for customers.
* Sales responsibility: Collaborate with Sales Specialists to proactively manage sales activities, meet revenue targets, and identify new opportunities within existing accounts.
* Manage personal responsibilities with an individual budget, including a clear sales and budget responsibility
* Handle negotiations, renewals, and public procurement agreements.
* Work with Sales Specialists to analyze product usage, identify growth opportunities, and optimize product utilization.



  





**YOUR BACKGROUND ✔️** 



* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant field, such as business administration or systems science.
* 2-5 years of relevant work experience, preferably as a Customer Success Manager.
* Strong interest in systems and digitization with experience in handling and learning new systems.
* Fluent in Swedish with excellent English skills.



  





**Bonus Qualifications:** 



* Experience working in the Public Sector or large organizations, understanding annual reporting, business planning, or quality processes.
* Understanding of complex sales methodologies.
* Prior involvement in public procurement and procurement processes.



  





**About You 👀** 




 To thrive in the role, we see that you are a relationship-builder with a genuine interest in customer-oriented work and smart digital solutions. You are self-motivated, proactive, and have a positive, attitude. You are fearless, ensuring tasks are completed and involving the necessary people along the way. You are curious and eager to learn, embracing new developments in the ever-evolving tech landscape. You value a positive team environment and the opportunity to be part of a growth journey. You are simply ready for your next adventure with Stratsys!
 



  





**About Us 🚀** 




 Does this look like a role for you? Do not hesitate, show your interest today since we are working ongoing with selection of candidates.
 



 Is this particular role not quite right for you - Show your interest for future openings by connecting with us. We look forward to hearing from you!
 



 Do you want to read more about us and your future colleagues and take part in our everyday life here at Stratsys? Go to jobs.stratsys.com or follow us on LinkedIn or Instagram.

title: Senior Infrastructure Project Manager
description:
**Make an impact in a high-profile infrastructure project!** 




 Are you that senior leader and team player with broad knowledge and experience as a Project Manager, looking for a challenging role with real impact? We are now looking for a freelancer to a big, significant project within infrastructure in Sweden. If you enjoy working in large, complex international projects (IPMA-B level), apply now and be part of a future-oriented project that will shape Sweden’s infrastructure for decades to come!
 



  





**Start:** 
 As soon as possible
 



**Duration:** 
 3-5 years
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm. International traveling required
 



  





 This role offers a challenging and influential position in a major infrastructure project, where you will work in a dynamic international environment alongside experts from diverse cultural backgrounds. You will have extensive opportunities for professional growth through specialized training and development programs, ensuring continuous learning and career advancement. To support your transition, we provide a structured onboarding process that helps you quickly integrate into the team and organization.
 



  





**Key responsibilities:** 




 - Lead and coordinate a large, diverse project team across Stockholm and Zoetermeer, Netherlands
 



 - Drive alignment and collaboration between disciplines, ensuring project goals are met
 



 - Maintain focus on both technical excellence and strong team relationships
 



 - Manage project execution, ensuring milestones are achieved within scope, budget, and timeline
 



 - Travel between Stockholm and Zoetermeer (50/50 initially, later evolving to 60/40 or 70/30)
 



  





**Job requirements** 




 To succeed in this role, we see that you have:
 



 - A completed technical college or university degree in the field of Electrical Engineering, Industrial Automation or equivalent
 



 - Extensive work experience as a Project Manager, with at least 5 years of demonstrable successful experience as a Senior Project Manager (at least IPMA-B level)
 



 - Experience in managing large and diverse teams
 



 - Experience in construction of infrastructure projects (roads and tunnels), with knowledge of system engineering methods
 



 - Fluent in English, with Swedish a big plus. If you're not fluent in Swedish, we prefer that you've lived and worked in Sweden for several years
 



  





**About the company** 




 Why Maandag Nordic? With us, you’ll get the chance to really put your ideas into action. We offer a work environment where you can grow and learn through hands-on experience - trying things out, making mistakes, and improving.
 



  





 For more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. Because when people are truly in the right place, they can develop themselves, fulfil their dreams and go to work with fresh energy every day. The energy and power released in the process is a catalyst for growth for companies. We started in the Netherlands, but now we also help professionals and organisations in Belgium, Poland, Dubai and Sweden. Our extensive knowledge of different markets, coupled with our wide network, enables us to make perfect matches quickly.

title: Service Delivery Manager
description:
Are you ready to shape the future of service management? Then this could be the next step in your career!
   

  

 At Sandvik Coromant, we’re now looking for a Service Delivery Manager to join us – a key role in making a significant impact on our future setup and being at the forefront of modern work practices. Welcome to a collaborative and engaging environment with excellent opportunities to grow and develop!
   

  

**Your mission**
 Joining our dynamic team of technical specialists, SAP application experts and professionals, you’ll bridge the gap between SAP and Coromant – translating technical language into clear orders. While you don’t need to understand all the technical details, a keen interest in technology and a willingness to learn are essential.
   

  

 You manage our Cloud services via SAP and oversee the entire process, from order to delivery. This includes coordinating internal activities and ensuring that SAP understands and meets our requirements. You ensure internal customers find it easy to place orders and communicate with the service manager. Key stakeholders include various SAP delivery teams, license managers, release managers and project managers. This role involves informal leadership, focusing on effective coordination and communication to achieve desired outcomes.
   

  

 The location for this position is Sandviken or Stockholm, and we apply a hybrid work set-up, allowing you to combine office and remote work.
   

  

**Your profile**
 We’re looking for someone with several years' experience in a similar role, preferably in a large organization within supply and management. You’re proficient in coordinating supplier activities, managing requirements and ensuring timely delivery and quality. Your knowledge is backed by a bachelor’s degree in a relevant field. Experience working with compliance frameworks or understanding of regulatory and security requirements in IT service delivery is beneficial. Experience in global roles and familiarity with SAP is also considered a plus. Acting in a global environment calls for excellent skills in English, both verbally and in writing, while knowledge of Swedish is beneficial.
   

  

 You have excellent networking and communication skills, easily building and maintaining effective relationships. With a structured and organized approach, combined with a keen interest in technology, you’re able to drive initiatives and challenge the status quo. You have an innovative and results-oriented mindset, making it easy to motivate yourself and strive forward.
   

  

**Our culture**
 Innovation is in our DNA and we’re proud to shape the future of manufacturing in close collaboration with our customers and partners. We believe in an inclusive, equal and open-minded culture, and we nurture our diversities to form a solid foundation for achieving great results. Add fair and rewarding benefits, as well as many different career opportunities in an inspiring global environment. Meet some of your future colleagues at our career page or visit our website, LinkedIn or Facebook page to get to know us further.
   

  

**Contact information**
 Are you curious to know more about this position? Please contact Elisabeth Broman, recruiting manager, at +46 (0)76 126 60 98
   

  

 We have already decided on which advertising channels and marketing campaigns we wish to use, and respectfully decline any additional contacts in that matter.
   

  

 Union contacts:
   

  

* Thomas Lilja, Unionen, +46 (0)70-261 04 82
* Göran Norell, Akademikerföreningen, +46 (0)70-616 43 78
* Peter Olsson-Andrée, Ledarna, +46 (0)70-222 48 55


 Recruitment Specialist: Anna Pettersen
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Send your application no later than April 22, 2025. Click apply and include your resume and cover letter in English. Please note that we don’t accept applications by e-mail. Job ID: R0077218.
   

  

 As we aim for a fair recruitment process, we utilize assessment tools to safeguard objectivity. When you apply for this job, you will therefore receive an invitation via email to a personality and logic ability test. Feedback comes immediately after the test has been completed and the selection process begins after the application deadline.
   

  

 To learn more about our recruitment process, please visit our career site or contact HR Services at hrservices.sweden@sandvik.com
   

  

*Sandvik Coromant is part of the global industrial engineering group Sandvik and is at the forefront of developing manufacturing tools and machining solutions, with knowledge that drives the industry standards and innovations demanded by the metalworking industry now and in the next industrial era. Collaborations with educational institutions, extensive investment in research and development and strong customer partnership ensure the development of machining technologies that change, lead and drive the future of manufacturing. Sandvik Coromant owns over 1700 patents worldwide, employs around 8000 staff and is represented in more than 150 countries.*

title: ServiceNow domain ITSM architect
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Digital pioneer ready to create an impact at scale? Look no further! I'm Masoud Tondkar Head of SA&A TT ITSM, and I'm searching for someone committed to improving experiences and connectivity.
   

  

 At Telia Company, we are a forward-thinking technology solutions provider with a focus on transforming businesses with cutting-edge IT services and solutions. We’re looking for an experienced and dynamic
 **ServiceNow ITSM Architect** 
 to join our team. This is an exciting opportunity for a skilled professional to leverage their expertise in
 **ServiceNow IT Service Management** 
 to drive impactful solutions and lead our stakeholders through their digital transformation journeys.
   

  

**As a ServiceNow domain ITSM architect you will…**
 You will be responsible for leading the design, implementation, and optimization of
 **ServiceNow IT Service Management (ITSM) solutions** 
 . You will work closely with different business units to understand their business needs, architect scalable solutions, and ensure best practices are followed throughout the lifecycle of ServiceNow implementations. This is a role that requires a deep understanding of ServiceNow ITSM capabilities and the ability to translate complex requirements into effective solutions.
   

  

 You will lead the
 **design** 
 and
 **implementation** 
 of
 **ServiceNow ITSM solutions** 
 , ensuring they align with business needs and best practices. You will provide architectural expertise across Incident, Problem, Change, Request Management, and Service Catalog, collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into scalable, efficient, and secure solutions. Overseeing
 **end-to-end implementations** 
 , you will ensure projects are delivered on time and meet business expectations. Additionally, you will mentor junior architects and consultants, manage stakeholder relationships, and conduct workshops and training sessions to enhance internal expertise. Staying up to date with the latest ServiceNow updates and industry trends, you will drive continuous improvements across implementations.
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For**
 You should have extensive experience
 **(5+ years) in ServiceNow ITSM architecture** 
 and implementation, including on-premise installations. A deep understanding of
 **ITSM modules** 
 such as
 **Incident** 
 ,
 **Problem** 
 ,
 **Change** 
 ,
 **Knowledge** 
 ,
 **Service Catalog** 
 , and
 **Request** 
**Management** 
 is essential, along with a strong background in
 **ITIL best practices** 
 and
 **ServiceNow ITIL configurations** 
 .
   

  

 You must have proven experience in designing and delivering complex, enterprise-level ServiceNow solutions, as well as the ability to lead cross-functional teams and manage client-facing projects. Strong
 **troubleshooting** 
 , problem-solving, and analytical skills are required, along with excellent communication skills to effectively present technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
   

  

 ServiceNow certifications, such as Certified ServiceNow System Administrator or Certified ServiceNow Implementation Specialist, are highly preferred. Fluency in English is required, and proficiency in another Nordic language is a plus.
   

  

 Additionally, desired skills include experience with
 **ServiceNow integrations** 
 such as
 **REST, SOAP, and MID Server** 
 , as well as knowledge of
 **Agile and Scrum methodologies** 
 . Previous experience with
 **ServiceNow platform development** 
 , including
 **scripting, UI customization, or Service Portal** 
 , is a plus. Familiarity with
 **ITIL V4** 
 ,
 **CI/CD pipelines** 
 , and
 **SAFe fundamentals** 
 will be highly beneficial for success in this role.
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We´re looking forward to your application by 2025/04/30. Please apply through our recruitment system to keep your data safe, as we can’t accept resumes via email. Required security clearance and background checks will be performed.
   

  

 Got questions? Please reach out to masoud.tondkar@teliacompany.com
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: Sharepoint Architect
description:
Position : Sharepoint Architect
 



 Location: Sodertalje, Sweden (Hybrid)
 



 Job Type: Permanent
 



  





 Job Description:
 



  





 SharePoint Solution Architect with expertise in both Microsoft Purview and Power Platform Implement SharePoint system solutions including programming backend and frontend components extending the SharePoint environment system capabilities The candidate should be proficient in the implementation and management of compliance solutions across Microsoft 365
 



  





 Primary Skills Must have
 



  





 10 years of Software Implementation experience with 6 years in leading and delivering Microsoft SharePoint and Power Platform solutions
 



 Microsoft SharePoint and associated platform skills such as SPFx Purview PnP Power Apps Power Automate and Syntex
 



 Implement SharePoint Solutions Design configure and deploy SharePoint environments including identity and access management Microsoft Purview retention labels and sensitivity labels

 Keep up to date with new M365 features and capabilities and assess their potential impact on the organization
 



 Support of internal customers writing usage guides and organizing trainings

 Project management skills
 



  





**Skills**

 Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, C#, Microsoft Teams Customization, Microsoft Viva Platform, PowerShell, SharePoint - Power Apps, SharePoint - Power Automate, SharePoint CSOM, SharePoint Online, Sharepoint SPFX

title: Plattformsspecialist - Red Hat Enterprise Linux
description:
Vill du vara med på vår resa att bli en leverantör av säkra it-tjänster till andra myndigheter? Är du intresserad av att tillämpa modern teknik i en komplex miljö? Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med och utveckla vår RHEL- plattform. Var med och gör samhället möjligt!
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 Skatteverkets it-avdelning är en av Sveriges största, med en stor och komplex it-miljö. Vi har fått ett utökat uppdrag som innebär att vi ska tillhandahålla säkra it-driftstjänster till fler myndigheter. Därför utökar vi nu vårt team som ansvar för Red Hat Linux plattformsutveckling. Tillsammans med kunniga och nytänkande kollegor kommer du bidra till Skatteverkets uppdrag att skapa samhällsnytta.
   

  

 Du ingår i ett team som arbetar DevOps inriktat. Tillsammans arbetar teamet med underhåll och utveckling av Skatteverkets RHEL plattform samt Red Hat OpenShift containerplattform. Teamet ansvarar för att underhålla, identifiera förbättringar, designa och utveckla plattformarna för Skatteverkets nuvarande och kommande plattformar, baserade på både vår egen VmWare plattform och molntjänster.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet till ständig utveckling och lärande i arbetet. Vi jobbar aktivt med kompetens- och teknikutveckling. Du har kunniga kollegor som du utbyter erfarenheter med och du kan utveckla både bredd och spets hos oss. Tack vare att vi är en stor it-organisation kan vi erbjuda goda möjligheter till intern rörlighet. Det är viktigt för oss att du har balans mellan jobb och fritid och vi erbjuder bland annat flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet att jobba delvis hemifrån.
   

  

**Om dig**
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.
   

  

 I det här jobbet ska du:
   

  

* ha god samarbetsförmåga, vara hjälpsam och ha ett gott bemötande
* ha förmågan och viljan att lära dig nya saker, vara flexibel och öppen för förändringar
* ha god problemlösningsförmåga, se mönster och kunna göra avgränsningar
* vara målfokuserad och bidra till att syftet med verksamheten uppnås
* agera medvetet och professionellt utifrån en god självinsikt
* uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska


 Du ska även ha:
   

  

* aktuell och relevant arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling av RedHat Linux plattform
* aktuell och relevant erfarenhet av att automatisera med exempelvis Bash och/eller Ansible.


 Det är önskvärt att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta i komplexa virtuella infrastrukturmiljöer med höga krav på säkerhet. Det är även önskvärt att du har erfarenhet av Red Hat Satellite. Kunskap om härdning och säkerhetshöjande åtgärder av infrastruktur och plattformar är även det önskvärt.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb. Här kan du även läsa mer om hur det är att jobba med it hos oss och ta del av vad några av våra medarbetare berättar om sina jobb: Jobba med it hos oss | Skatteverket
   

  

 När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/223 | Kontakt: Daniel Bynander (Rekryterande chef) daniel.bynander@skatteverket.se, Caroline Törnkvist (HR-specialist) caroline.tornkvist@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, Therese Sjödin, Seko therese.sjodin@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2025-04-02 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-04-23

title: Supporttekniker
description:
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Är du en serviceinriktad och tekniskt kunnig person som trivs i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö?
   

  

 Vi söker nu en engagerad supporttekniker för ett konsultuppdrag hos en myndighet. Har du erfarenhet av användarsupport och brinner för att lösa tekniska problem? Då kan detta vara uppdraget för dig!
   

  

 Som konsult hos Randstad är du anställd hos oss och jobbar ute hos någon av våra kunder. Du har samma fördelar hos Randstad som hos andra arbetsgivare med kollektivavtal och förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, företagshälsovård, försäkringar och rabatt på träningskort. Utöver det erbjuds du även en mängd karriärmöjligheter, får möta olika företagskulturer och erfarenhet från olika branscher vilket gör att du utvecklar din kompetens och får ett välfyllt CV. Tjänsten kan innebära många kontakter och då är det viktigt med god samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga. Som person ser vi att du är drivande och van att arbeta självständigt. Söker du en arbetsgivare som erbjuder varierande uppdrag och nya kontaktnät kommer du att trivas hos oss.
   

  

**Ansvarsområde**
 I rollen som supporttekniker kommer du att vara en viktig del av supportteamet och arbeta med att ge teknisk support till användare inom myndigheten. Du kommer att hantera ärenden kopplade till datorer, mobiltelefoner, surfplattor samt digitala möteslösningar och mjukvara som MS Word och SharePoint.
   

  

 Arbetet innebär många kontaktytor och kräver en lösningsorienterad och serviceinriktad inställning. Du behöver ha en vana att arbeta i en miljö med högt tempo och jobba under tidspress.
   

  

 Tjänsten är säkerhetsklassad och slutkandidaten kommer att genomgå en säkerhetsprövning.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Gymnasieutbildning
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av kundkontakt från supportfunktion, med aktuell erfarenhet av service desk, gett support ur ett användarperspektiv.
* God erfarenhet av felsökning och användarsupport på datorer, mobiltelefoner, surfplattor.
* Arbetat med många kontaktytor och parallella processer i en miljö med högt tempo.
* Mycket god kunskap om funktionalitet av datorer, mobiltelefoners/surfplattor.
* God kunskap om Digitala möten, MS Word och utvecklarläget i word


**Meriterande**
* Utbildning/certifiering inom tjänsteområdet support och/eller kundservice t.ex. support center analyst.
